name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afghanistan said "Humanitarianism should not be a tool for political pressure, and women's rights are an internal issue of the country." Netizens said: "This line is very familiar, as if I have heard it somewhere before"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Linyi, Shandong. Rescue teams salvage vehicles and bodies washed away by floods.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on July 9, Zhan Xiangchun, chairman of the Linyi Federation of Literary and Art Circles in Shandong Province, was killed on July 8. 
Linyi funeral home staff confirmed to The Paper that the deceased Zhan Xiangchun was stabbed several times, with knife wounds on his face and neck. He was sent here on July 8. The police have done an autopsy and heard that the murderer was his driver, who has been arrested. Linyi Federation of Literary and Art Circles Office staff said that they did not know whether Zhan Xiangchun was killed and that "the relevant situation is not convenient to disclose."

content: On July 6, Bawang Cha Ji announced a donation of 5 million yuan to the Dongting Lake disaster area, triggering a large number of netizens to boycott

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens tracked the operation of a tanker truck in the past three months and found that in addition to transporting kerosene and grain and oil, the tanker truck also transported feed, fertilizer and suspected hazardous chemicals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Fuzhou, Fujian. An old man who sells rings at a stall on Xuesheng Street in Cangshan District posted a video to report that local idlers colluded with the urban management to collect protection fees and piled construction waste all over his stall. As of now, the old man's Douyin account has been banned by the platform from posting works.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on July 9, Xiaomi has recently taken a new measure to restrict the installation of the Xiaomi international version of the system on devices sold in mainland China. If a user tries to flash the domestic version of the system and install the international version of the system, the device will display "not supported" during the boot process and will not be able to enter the system. This restriction has been implemented on the Redmi Note 13 series.

However, the specific industry was not specified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Fujian. A netizen posted that when interviewing at Luckin Coffee, the HR sent a bunch of questions, and when he arrived, the store manager didn't ask anything, just chatted normally. In the end, he was notified that he failed the interview because he was "inexperienced, timid, and weak." The netizen also said in the comment area that Luckin kept calling him to delete the post, and now if he doesn't answer the phone, he will call his family. https://t.co/Ydc7bszrsB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Education Bureau of Xiqing District in Tianjin City issued new regulations to break the iron rice bowl of in-service teachers. Starting from August 1, the district’s public primary and secondary schools will fully implement the employment system and job management system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many places across the country have announced that the new crown vaccine will no longer be free of charge and a charging policy will be implemented.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up to the incident of "Iron Head" peeing at the Yasukuni Shrine in Japan
On July 9, local police announced that they had arrested a 29-year-old accomplice who was responsible for purchasing the spray paint on suspicion of damaging property. At the same time, the authorities said that they had obtained arrest warrants for "Iron Head" Dong Guangming and two others who had already left the country, and would launch a wanted warrant.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 9, the State Council announced that in response to the "chaos in transporting edible oil by tank trucks" reported by the media, it will organize the National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Public Security, the Ministry of Transport, the State Administration for Market Regulation, the National Grain and Reserves Administration and other departments to hold a special meeting to study the problem and set up a joint investigation team to thoroughly investigate relevant issues in the transportation of edible oil by tank trucks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 9, Anshan, Liaoning. Many netizens reported that the tap water in the High-tech Zone stinks, and citizens buy drinking water in supermarkets. In response, Anshan Municipal Government Service Hotline 12345 said: Routine treatment is being carried out, and the entire line is being flushed, so it can be used with confidence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 8, in Suizhou, Hubei, a girl posted a video crying that her father came by on his bike in the early morning to confiscate her mobile phone, and would rather take her phone than take her away to live with him. The girl said, which child doesn't play with mobile phones?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 8, Ningxia. A psychologist said, "There is a recent trend that the number of public officials seeking treatment is increasing. In the past, very few public officials sought treatment, mainly due to work pressure or interpersonal relationships.
Many netizens left comments in the comment area to express their sympathy. One netizen from Hebei said, "I am in the system, and now I feel that I am depressed and it is already very serious."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 9, the German Embassy in China issued a statement to commemorate the 9th anniversary of the "709" lawyers case.
Since July 9, 2015, the Chinese authorities have arrested, summoned, criminally detained, taken away, lost contact, and interviewed hundreds of lawyers, civil rights activists, petitioners, and their relatives in 23 provinces, and the whereabouts of some of them are unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The comment section below this microblog:

content: A rescue team in Jinan, Shandong, was complained by netizens because of too many suicides in the rescue video it released

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 9, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that all parties should remain calm and restrained in response to the Russian military's attack on a Ukrainian children's hospital.
Netizens criticized it for being cold-blooded and shameless, with no bottom line

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 9, the Shenyang Public Security Bureau announced major results in the “Crackdown on Gangs and Elimination of Evil”:
A netizen was suspected of provoking quarrels and provoking trouble for "fabricating and publishing false information about Shenyang criminal cases in chronological order" and was held criminally responsible in accordance with the law.
Three netizens were suspected of provoking quarrels and provoking trouble for publishing "false information involving criminal cases" and were held criminally responsible in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Douyin issued an announcement on the management of false news related to Shenyang. Currently, Douyin has cleared a total of 1,518 pieces of rumored content related to Shenyang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In 2013, Xi Jinping pointed out that if food safety is not properly managed for a long time, people will question whether the party is qualified to govern.
“If our party cannot even manage food safety properly while governing China, and if we continue to do so for a long time, some people will question whether we are qualified.”
